data.name: plBannerName.Help
data.value: Enter a name for the Banner. The Name will be displayed as alternate text for the displayed image

data.name: BannerName.ErrorMessage
data.value: You Must Enter a Banner Name

data.name: plBannerType.Help
data.value: Select a type of Banner to display

data.name: plBannerGroup.Help
data.value: Enter a banner group if you wish to relate a set of banners

data.name: plImage.Help
data.value: For graphical banners you should specify the banner image ( by either uploading an image file or linking to a remote image file via URL ). For text banners you should specify the URL you want displayed in the ad text.

data.name: plWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the banner image width. This is optional for image banners but is mandatory for flash banners.

data.name: plHeight.Help
data.value: Enter the banner image height. This is optional for image banners but is mandatory for flash banners.

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: Enter a banner description. This will be used as alternate text for Image banners or as the actual text for Text banners

data.name: plURL.Help
data.value: Enter the URL which you wish the user to be directed to if they click the banner. If you do not enter a URL, the URL for the Vendor will be used

data.name: plImpressions.Help
data.value: Enter the number of Impressions to display. For unlimited Impressions enter Zero (0).

data.name: Impressions.ErrorMessage
data.value: You Must Enter a Valid Number of Impressions

data.name: plCPM.Help
data.value: CPM is the cost for 1000 Impressions. Cost may also be a flat fee.

data.name: CPM.ErrorMessage
data.value: You Must Enter a Valid CPM or Cost

data.name: plStartDate.Help
data.value: Use the Start Date to control when the ad campaign should start

data.name: plEndDate.Help
data.value: Use the End Date to control when the ad campaign should end

data.name: plCriteria.Help
data.value: Specify whether the campaign should end when the Impressions are used AND/OR the End Date is past

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About The Banners Module

The Banners Module displays rotating banner advertising for Site and Host Vendors.

Set Banner Options

  1. Add a Banners module, or go to an existing Banners module.
  2. Click Set Banner Options.
  3. At Banner Source, select Site or Host.
  4. At Banner Type, select the banner type.
  5. At Banner Count, select the nubmer of banners to be displayed.
  6. Click Update.
